actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the laws relating to the Osage Tribe in Oklahoma.

summary.text: Provides that the Department of the Interior may determine the heirs or legatees of any deceased owner of mineral rights, unrestricted real estate, or funds on deposit of the Osage Tribe of Oklahoma. Prohibits such administrative determination if (1) the aggregate interests exceed $5,000, or (2) a court of competent jurisdiction has under taken the probate of the deceased's estate.

titles.title: A bill to amend the laws relating to the Osage Tribe in Oklahoma.
